document.title: Getting Started with Next.js 14: A Comprehensive Guide

`,(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,o.jsxDEV)(t.code,{children:`app/\r
\u251C\u2500\u2500 layout.tsx          # Root layout\r
\u251C\u2500\u2500 page.tsx           # Home page\r
\u251C\u2500\u2500 about/\r
\u2502   \u251C\u2500\u2500 page.tsx       # About page\r
\u2502   \u2514\u2500\u2500 layout.tsx     # About layout\r
\u2514\u2500\u2500 blog/\r
    \u251C\u2500\u2500 page.tsx       # Blog listing\r

document.excerpt: # Getting Started with Next.js 14 Next.js 14 introduces powerful new features that make building modern web applications faster and more efficient. In this comprehensive guide, we'll explore the...

document.title: E-Commerce Platform
document.description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with Next.js, featuring real-time inventory management, secure payments, and an intuitive admin dashboard.
document.approach: Built a modern e-commerce platform using Next.js 14 with App Router, implementing secure payment processing with Stripe, real-time inventory management, and a comprehensive admin dashboard.
challenges: Implementing secure payment processing with PCI compliance
Building real-time inventory synchronization across multiple warehouses
Creating an intuitive admin dashboard for inventory management
solutions: Integrated Stripe Elements for secure payment processing
Implemented WebSocket connections for real-time inventory updates
Built a responsive admin dashboard with data visualization
document.architectureDiagram: graph TD A[Next.js Frontend] --> B[API Routes] B --> C[PostgreSQL Database] B --> D[Stripe API] B --> E[Redis Cache] F[Admin Dashboard] --> B
